content.rendered:
As a part of our efforts to achieve our environmental objectives, iPhone XR not features a energy adapter or EarPods. Please use your present Apple energy adapter and headphones or purchase these equipment individually
Water and mud resistant (1 meter for as much as half-hour, IP67)
Single 12MP Wide digicam with Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, Depth Control, Smart HDR, and 4K video as much as 60fps
7MP TrueDepth entrance digicam system with Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, Depth Control, and 1080p video
Face ID for safe authentication and Apple Pay
A12 Bionic with second-technology Neural Engine
Fast-charge succesful
Wireless charging
iOS with redesigned widgets on the Home display, all-new App Library, App Clips and extra

excerpt.rendered:
As part of our efforts to reach our environmental goals, iPhone XR no longer includes a power adapter or EarPods. Please use your existing Apple power adapter and headphones or buy these accessories separately
Water and dust resistant (1 meter for up to 30 minutes, IP67)
Single 12MP Wide camera with Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, Depth Control, Smart HDR, and 4K video up to 60fps
